languages.text: "Вы сами выбираете потакание слабостям своим, крадете, лжете и уклоняетесь от долга. И что хуже — творите сие, зная, что Он все видит".

traits.locale_text: "Вы сами выбираете потакание слабостям своим, крадете, лжете и уклоняетесь от долга. И что хуже — творите сие, зная, что Он все видит".

languages.text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."
languages.original_text: "Вы сами выбираете потакание слабостям своим, крадете, лжете и уклоняетесь от долга. И что хуже — творите сие, зная, что Он все видит".

traits.locale_text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."
"You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."
"You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."
"You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."
"You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."

languages.text: «Pero preferís entregaros al vicio, robar, mentir y rechazar vuestras obligaciones. Y lo que es peor, hacéis estas cosas a sabiendas de que Él lo ve todo».
languages.original_text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."

traits.locale_text: «Pero preferís entregaros al vicio, robar, mentir y rechazar vuestras obligaciones. Y lo que es peor, hacéis estas cosas a sabiendas de que Él lo ve todo».

languages.text: 「あなたは自分の弱さに甘んじ、盗み、嘘をつき、義務を放棄することを選ぶ。さらに、あなたは主がすべてを見ておられることを知っていながら、これらのことを行っているのです」
languages.original_text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは自分の弱さに甘んじ、盗み、嘘をつき、義務を放棄することを選ぶ。さらに、あなたは主がすべてを見ておられることを知っていながら、これらのことを行っているのです」

languages.text: “可你们却放纵弱点，选择盗窃、撒谎，逃避责任。更糟糕的是，你们明明知道祂全知全能，可还是犯下了这样的罪行。”
languages.original_text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."

traits.locale_text: “可你们却放纵弱点，选择盗窃、撒谎，逃避责任。更糟糕的是，你们明明知道祂全知全能，可还是犯下了这样的罪行。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt euch euren Schwächen hingegeben, um zu stehlen, zu lügen und euch vor eurer Pflicht zu drücken. Und was noch schlimmer ist ... ihr tut diese Dinge im Wissen, dass Er alles sieht."
languages.original_text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt euch euren Schwächen hingegeben, um zu stehlen, zu lügen und euch vor eurer Pflicht zu drücken. Und was noch schlimmer ist ... ihr tut diese Dinge im Wissen, dass Er alles sieht."

languages.text: « Au lieu de cela, vous avez choisi de vous vautrer dans la faiblesse, le vol, le mensonge et la paresse. Pire encore, vous vivez dans le péché tout en sachant pertinemment que rien ne Lui échappe. »
languages.original_text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."

traits.locale_text: « Au lieu de cela, vous avez choisi de vous vautrer dans la faiblesse, le vol, le mensonge et la paresse. Pire encore, vous vivez dans le péché tout en sachant pertinemment que rien ne Lui échappe. »

languages.text: "Zayıflıklarınıza taviz vermeyi seçtiniz. Çalmayı, yalan söylemeyi ve işten kaytarmayı yeğlediniz. En kötüsü de O'nun her şeyi gördüğünü bilerek bunları yaptınız."
languages.original_text: "You choose to indulge your weaknesses, to steal, lie, and shirk your duty. And what is worse, you do these things knowing that He sees everything."
